You open ISO-files by burning them to a DVD :)
The ISO-file is an exact copy of the disc.

This one has some commentary by the actors in the episodes.  it's really annoying, just a heads up.
Download Poweriso and it will extract the ts_audio and ts_video folders with the vob files in them. It works just like winzip and winrar.
